headline: How Coffin Butte Landfill Expansion Approval Could Impact Republic Services (RSG) Investors
summary: In November 2025, Republic Services received approval from the Benton County Board of Commissioners to expand its 178-acre Coffin Butte Landfill, subject to environmental monitoring, odor management, and annual compliance-auditing payments to the county. This regulatory green light, alongside continued analyst support such as Goldman Sachs’ recent Buy rating, reinforces the company’s long-term operating capacity and environmental commitments in a key service area. We’ll now explore how the...
